scripts.clean: rm -rf server/lib/ client/public/*.js client/public/controllers/ client/public/services/ client/public/views client/public/*.html
scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/coffee -b -o server/lib/ --no-header -c server/app/ && ./node_modules/.bin/coffee -b -o client/public/ --no-header -c client/app/ && ./node_modules/.bin/jade client/app/*.jade -o client/public/ && ./node_modules/.bin/jade client/app/views/*.jade -o client/public/views/ && ./node_modules/.bin/bower install
